TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LogCategory extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定使用 SharePoint 日志服务编写的消息出现在“输出”窗口和“错误列表”窗口的什么位置。

span.span: Specifies where messages written by using the SharePoint log service appear in the **Output** window and **Error List** window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值指定是否在显示消息**输出**窗口或**错误列表**窗口 （或两者），和消息显示在组**错误列表**窗口。The values specify whether a message appears in the **Output** window or **Error List** window (or both), and the group in which the message appears in the **Error List** window. 要写入到的消息**输出**窗口或**错误列表**窗口中的 SharePoint 项目系统中，扩展使用之一方法对象。To write a message to the **Output** window or **Error List** window from an extension of the SharePoint project system, use one of the methods of an object. ## 启用详细消息Enabling Verbose Messages 若要显示详细消息中的**输出**窗口中，HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\VisualStudio\10.0\SharePointTools 必须设置为 1 的注册表项下的 EnableDiagnostics 值。To display verbose messages in the **Output** window, the EnableDiagnostics value under the registry key HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\VisualStudio\10.0\SharePointTools must be set to 1. 有关详细信息，请参阅[调试 SharePoint 解决方案](/visualstudio/sharepoint/debugging-sharepoint-solutions)。For more information, see [Debugging SharePoint Solutions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/debugging-sharepoint-solutions).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory Error = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定消息显示在“输出”窗口和“错误列表”窗口的“错误”组中。

span.span: Specifies that the message appears in the **Output** window and in the **Errors** group of the **Error List** window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory Message = int32(3)

summary.span: 指定消息显示在“输出”窗口和“错误列表”窗口的“消息”组中。

span.span: Specifies that the message appears in the **Output** window and in the **Message** group of the **Error List** window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory Status = int32(4)

summary.span: 指定消息只出现在“输出”窗口。

span.span: Specifies that the message appears only in the **Output** window.

summary.span: 消息不会出现在“错误列表”窗口。

span.span: The message does not appear in the **Error List** window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory Verbose = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定如果启用了详细消息则消息只出现在“输出”窗口。

span.span: Specifies that the message appears only in the **Output** window, if verbose messages are enabled.

summary.span: 消息不会出现在“错误列表”窗口。

span.span: The message does not appear in the **Error List** window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory Warning = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定消息显示在“输出”窗口和“错误列表”窗口的“警告”组中。

span.span: Specifies that the message appears in the **Output** window and in the **Warning** group of the **Error List** window.
